name: The Eternal Dream
description:
CONTROLS: Arrow keys or WSAD to move, Z to undo, and R to restart.

Instructions:

  • Whenever you’re in the entity’s vision and you move, they will move one step towards you.
  • If your character glows red, then an entity is one space away from you in any direction.

THE ETERNAL DREAM is a Puzzlescript game that mixes the genres of horror and puzzle into one game. Players will have to figure out ways to navigate throughout all the areas without getting themselves brutally killed by all sorts of horrors within the red cosmos.
